# Tests that muxt check ignores template files with only comments and whitespace
# Such files are not flagged as unused

muxt generate --use-receiver-type=T
muxt check

exec go build

-- template.gohtml --
{{/*
  This file only contains define blocks.
  The file template itself has only comments and whitespace.
*/}}

{{define "GET / Index()"}}
<h1>Hello</h1>
{{end}}

-- go.mod --
module server

go 1.22
-- template.go --
package server

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed *.gohtml
var formHTML embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(formHTML, "*"))

type T struct{}

func (T) Index() string {
	return "index"
}
